Nightlight:

Nightlight felt scared when she saw Lambda fell in stasis lock. She 
took her and dificulty she moved Lambda to Cr. After she closed the 
door she opened her comm link and spoke with Aerotaur and Windlord 

"Windlord, Aerotaur I've found a femme in Base's door she's wounded 
and unarmed, she only could said something like "I'm sorry I attaked" 
and she's (Describing Lambda)...  By now she's in cr and she will be 
in a large while... What have I to do after cr?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     Outside, Aerotaur began chopping down trees and vines.  He tied 
logs from 
> various branches at about head level.  He tied one end of each to a 
tree 
> trunk with a small gap that he could shoot to set off the trap.
> 
> ::Lambda::
>     Meanwhile, inside the base, Lambda is sitting very still next 
to the 
> door.  Unarmed and wounded she spots the ill looking Nightlight 
going 
> outside.  "I'm sorry I attacked."  She went into stasis lock.
